title: US Executives Are Flocking to Saudi Davos in the Desert
description: Some top American business leaders are headed to the Saudi business conference. But Biden administration officials, angry over the kingdom’s stance on oil production and ties with Russia, are staying away.
dc:creator: Kate Kelly
media:credit: Tasneem Alsultan for The New York Times
media:description: Guests arriving in 2019 for the Future Investment Initiative conference, nicknamed “Davos in the Desert,” in the Saudi capital, Riyadh.
